name: Fish Switch
description:
Fish Switch is a fun, fast-paced match 3 game where you do just what the title implies; switch fish!

Experience the puzzling adventure of a lifetime as you visit numerous well-known fishing locations throughout the world. Who knows... the fish may even change from location to location!

Play with a variety of familiar, fishy faces from our other popular mobile game, Fishing Paradise 3D!

Relax and let the beautiful ambiance of the waves wash over you for an immersive gaming experience.
